content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
I was a little scriptural about Korean/Mexican tacos when my friend took me to try thus place on her Groupon. The Calbi tacos were one of the best I had in my life. On the second visit I got a burrito - excellent taste and huge, one can easily get 2.5 meals out of one burrito. Very good fusion of Korean and South American flavors, bravo Â chef Kang!
